nodes.text: Raxus II was the second planet orbiting the star Raxus in the Raxus system. Located in the Tion Hegemony in the Outer Rim, it was an ice planet.
During the Cold War, recent studies of relics suggested that Raxus II was once inhabited by the ancient Tionese Empire.
In the game Star Wars: The Old Republic, the planet is written out as Raxus Two.
